pr_title: bugfix:correct wrong property names in seata-spring-boot-starter.

timeline.message: divide ClientProperties into TmProperties and RmProperties,

timeline.author: slievrly

replies.bodyText: Will the hyphen code style change to camel?
replies.author: slievrly

replies.bodyText: When read item from yml/properties files spring-boot will do the conversion automatically.
replies.author: xingfudeshi

replies.bodyText: minusToCamel is used to convert the items read from original configuration.
replies.author: xingfudeshi

replies.bodyText: In the code is actually read the dot between configuration items, I wrong thought is a hyphen interval.
replies.author: slievrly
